holidays.title: National Blonde Brownie Day
holidays.description: Blondies are baked bars with brown sugar for a warm, rich butterscotch-flavored treat.

holidays.title: Answer Your Cat's Questions Day
holidays.description: Your kitty has questions and today is the day to be answering them.

holidays.title: Clashing Clothes Day
holidays.description: Forget about fashion do’s and don’ts and join us as we clash into Clashing Clothes Day!

holidays.title: Come in From the Cold Day
holidays.description: Time to come into a warm room to appreciate National Come in From the Cold Day.

holidays.title: Dance of the Seven Veils Day
holidays.description: Whether you’re a dancer or not, there is an activity for you on this day.

holidays.title: National Grandpa Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the unparalleled relationship between grandparents and grandchildren.

holidays.title: National Hot Sauce Day
holidays.description: Spicy sauce lovers will put it on everything from eggs to sandwiches to steak.

holidays.title: National Polka Dot Day
holidays.description: Who said polka dots have gone out of fashion? Don some spots and let’s get stylish.

holidays.title: National Sanctity of Human Life Day
holidays.description: Join our efforts to save innocent lives as we observe National Sanctity of Human Life Day.

holidays.title: Plurinational State Foundation Day
holidays.description: Here’s everything you need to know about Bolivia’s multicultural and multiethnic identity.

holidays.title: Roe vs. Wade Day
holidays.description: Let’s look at this landmark moment in the women’s rights and liberation movement.

holidays.title: Enya Umanzor’s Birthday
holidays.description: Enya Umanzor is revolutionizing content creation with her creative and very witty approach.

holidays.title: fouseyTUBE’s Birthday
holidays.description: The internet star shows no signs of slowing down as he continues to entertain millions.

holidays.title: Guy Fieri’s Birthday
holidays.description: Known for his recipes, Guy Fieri is one of the most influential culinary stars of this decade.

holidays.title: Logic’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this multi-talented, award-winning rapper, songwriter, and record producer, music is a way of life.

holidays.title: Steve Perry’s Birthday
holidays.description: His parents separated when he was eight years old, so he moved to Lemoore, California.

holidays.title: Tim Dillon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today, we celebrate a brilliant comedian and host of the video podcast, “The Tim Dillon Show.”
